markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Azata Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1359) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 36 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Musetouched](/Feats.aspx?ID=1353)

</column>

---

Your lineage traces back to the realm of Elysium, and you can harness its magic using this connection. You can cast [_glitterdust_](/Spells.aspx?ID=136) and [_remove paralysis_](/Spells.aspx?ID=253) each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.
name: Azata Magic
